WorkItem.Description:
1) Load erstyx.before.xml. Dps: score is reported as 3984.06.
2) Tools, optimize, with max thoroughness. 
3) Dialog says "The Optimizer found a gearset with a score of 3976.427. (Your currently equipped gear has a score of 3984.056.) Would you like to equip the optimized gear?
4) Click yes even though this looks like a downgrade.
5) Dps: score is now reported as 3999.92 in the main character panel, which actually makes it an upgrade.
6) Un-equip the waist gem, and note that Dps: is reported as 3976.43.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer underreports new rating (doesn't count bonus socket)

Comments.Message: The optimizer was not updated yet to support blacksmithing gems.
